weekly_top_story.headline: CMS Finalizes Medicare Physician Fee Schedule and Announces Expanded Coverage and Pricing Deal for Weight Loss Drugs
weekly_top_story.summary: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) finalized the 2026 Physician Fee Schedule and reached a significant deal to negotiate prices and expand Medicare and Medicaid coverage for weight loss medications, potentially reshaping patient access and payment models in obesity care.

stories.headline: Government Shutdown Hits 35-Day Record, SNAP Program Partially Funded Amid Ongoing Negotiations
stories.summary: The unprecedented federal government shutdown reached 35 days, forcing partial funding of the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP), creating uncertainty in public health support systems during critical times.

stories.headline: Catawba County Urges Vaccination to Protect Against Flu, COVID-19, and RSV Amid Respiratory Illness Season
stories.summary: Local health officials stressed the importance of vaccines for influenza, COVID-19, and RSV to protect vulnerable populations during the upcoming respiratory virus season, emphasizing vaccines as critical preventive tools for healthcare professionals to promote.
